This file contains the explicit expressions necessary for the case (l,m)=(2,2).

A=(8+12 n^2+12 x+x^2+8 n (4+x))/(4 (7+9 n+2 n^2))

B=-(((-2+2 n+x) (4+2 n+x))/(4 (1+n) (7+2 n)))

n0=3

r_3=(6432768+11432704 x+8253120 x^2+2974208 x^3+574976 x^4+60912 x^5+3456 x^6+96 x^7+x^8)/(208 (40704+65984 x+39936 x^2+10488 x^3+1216 x^4+60 x^5+x^6))

rtilde=(30+6 n)/(35+6 n)+((3+2 n) x)/(3+5 n+2 n^2+2 (2+2 n))+x^2/(12+20 n+8 n^2+2 (8+8 n))

a=-((4 (26600 n+41980 n^2+22756 n^3+4928 n^4+336 n^5+16240 x+48310 n x+35516 n^2 x+7976 n^3 x+528 n^4 x+4060 x^2+6495 n x^2+2939 n^2 x^2+540 n^3 x^2+36 n^4 x^2))/((480 n+312 n^2+48 n^3+116 x+256 n x+48 n^2 x+29 x^2+6 n x^2) (840+1248 n+456 n^2+48 n^3+420 x+352 n x+48 n^2 x+35 x^2+6 n x^2)))

b=(4 (29+6 n) (35+6 n) (5 n+2 n^2) (-2+2 n+x) (4+2 n+x))/((480 n+312 n^2+48 n^3+116 x+256 n x+48 n^2 x+29 x^2+6 n x^2) (840+1248 n+456 n^2+48 n^3+420 x+352 n x+48 n^2 x+35 x^2+6 n x^2))

esta=-36864 (3+n)^2 (11+2 n)^2 (2487052+2199401 n+866309 n^2+181771 n^3+19017 n^4+750 n^5) (12486452+10042351 n+3063709 n^2+439721 n^3+29517 n^4+750 n^5)-9216 (751360091229120+6518104294870330 n+11955550616063772 n^2+10682553597786756 n^3+5731105261173127 n^4+2016618078416116 n^5+485089441849489 n^6+81035670230144 n^7+9370447080550 n^8+733008431704 n^9+36849431936 n^10+1068612000 n^11+13500000 n^12) t^2-64 (9774057183710073+16312212535668366 n+12082684830636967 n^2+5218185348051324 n^3+1450436572818832 n^4+269891166509520 n^5+33819385504090 n^6+2788904079312 n^7+142325558352 n^8+3920184000 n^9+40500000 n^10) t^4-16 (47+6 n) (53+6 n) (857+125 n)^2 (228445+170590 n+46166 n^2+5280 n^3+216 n^4) t^6-(47+6 n)^2 (53+6 n)^2 (857+125 n)^2 t^8

estb=-4096 (3+n)^2 (11+2 n)^2 (4962118+2967509 n+586106 n^2+37339 n^3+78 n^4) (48554618+53946259 n+22300156 n^2+4348739 n^3+403878 n^4+14400 n^5)-1024 (53618728104644220+186870916531690980 n+270994348223466832 n^2+223496496764093486 n^3+118689249683130887 n^4+43162944098329646 n^5+11087767045848134 n^6+2035394323941464 n^7+265775929240000 n^8+24127942626624 n^9+1448067976416 n^10+51659596800 n^11+829440000 n^12) t^2-64 (35219656205562957+87700031411675244 n+94452423702434478 n^2+58150857442647716 n^3+22715723923266238 n^4+5891589519444080 n^5+1028547616348560 n^6+119458049323008 n^7+8842685532768 n^8+377185766400 n^9+7050240000 n^10) t^4-16 (47+6 n) (53+6 n) (1021+400 n)^2 (228445+170590 n+46166 n^2+5280 n^3+216 n^4) t^6-(47+6 n)^2 (53+6 n)^2 (1021+400 n)^2 t^8

esterror=-1057969393436196864-494200104110784512 t^2-154276454164709376 t^4-15573229621284864 t^6-536755963830272 t^8-6815770554176 t^10-32324925632 t^12-52767648 t^14-25281 t^16
